solution_line_template: So two adult tickets cost ${adult_ticket_price} x {num_adult_tickets} = $<<{adult_ticket_price}*{num_adult_tickets}={adult_tickets_total}>>{adult_tickets_total}.
So the total cost of all the tickets amounted to ${adult_tickets_total} + ${child_tickets_total} = $<<{adult_tickets_total}+{child_tickets_total}={total_before_discount}>>{total_before_discount}.
The family had a discount, so they paid a total of ${total_before_discount} - ${discount} = $<<{total_before_discount}-{discount}={total_after_discount}>>{total_after_discount}.
